articles.title: Asian Games Equestrian: 'Stupid' moment leads to topper Ashish Limaye's elimination - The Bridge
articles.description: Ashish, who topped the standings overnight, has been eliminated due to missed jumps. His disqualification also means Ashish missed a medal in the individual as well as team events.
articles.content:
After finishing on top in the Eventing Cross Country individual event overnight, Ashish Limaye was disqualified in the second round after he missed the jumps on Sunday.
